body.name: Toaster Oven Air Fryer Combo, AUMATE Kitchen in the box Countertop Convection Oven, Airfryer,Knob Control Pizza Oven with Timer/Auto-Off, 4 Accessories and Recipe Included,1550W,19 QT, Stainless Steel

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Kitchen in the box Store

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 7 hrs 7 mins
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 7 hrs 7 mins
features: 【Ultimate Versatility】The AUMATE Kitchen in the box air fryer toaster oven is the ultimate addition to your kitchen. This versatile countertop convection oven can do it all - air fry, bake, broil, toast, warm, and even has high/low convection fan speed options. With this multifunctional countertop oven, you can cook all your favorite foods that can be made in an air fryer or a traditional convection oven. Save space and money with this all-in-one machine that can meet all of your cooking needs.

【Less Oil and Healthy Diet】The AUMATE countertop convection toaster oven features surround 360° air convection technology with a powerful fan that increases air flow circulation for faster cooking. This technology locks in moisture and prevents uneven heating that can lead to food scorching. With up to 75% less fat and grease than traditional frying methods, you can enjoy the same crispy and delicious taste without all the extra calories. It's a perfect gift for your health-conscious families.

【19 Quart Capacity fits Whole Family】This toaster oven boasts a spacious interior with dimensions of 12.5 x 12.7 x 7.5 inches, making it perfect for cooking a variety of dishes. It can fit up to 2.7 pounds of chicken, 18 egg tarts, 16 chicken wings, a 10-inch pizza, 1.77 pounds of French fries, or 2 pieces of 8-ounce steak. Plus, it comes equipped with 4 accessories - a baking pan, oven rack, fry basket, and crumb tray - so you can start cooking your favorite meals right away.

【Knob Control & Convenient to Use】The Kitchen in the box convection oven is incredibly user-friendly with its simple 4-knob control system. With the TOAST TIMER, FUNCTION, TEMPERATURE, and OVEN TIMER knobs, all functions can be easily achieved by simply adjusting the knobs. This makes it convenient to use and suitable for people of all ages to operate.

【Efficient and Energy Saving】With a powerful 1550 Watts and 6 heat elements, this convection oven can cook your food faster and more efficiently than traditional ovens. Its 360° surround airflow technology ensures that heat is evenly distributed throughout the oven, resulting in perfectly cooked meals every time. Plus, this energy-efficient appliance can help you save time and money on your energy bill.
body.description: AUMATE Kitchen in the box 1550W Air Fryer Toaster Oven Aumate is a Texas-based brand with a manufacturing base located in Hong Kong. We take pride in combining American originality with superior Chinese production methods to deliver high-quality products at affordable prices. By leveraging the best of both worlds, we're able to maintain our commitment to quality while keeping our prices low. Whether you're in Texas or anywhere else in the world, you can trust that Aumate products are designed with your needs in mind. 7 functions: Warm, Air Fry, Convection Bake, Convection Broil, Bake, Broil and Toast Less oil & More Healthy:Cooking food with less oil but also get crispy taste and rich flavor. Convection Fan:Utilize new technoloy of 360° constant hot air circulation, avoid food scorching due to uneven heating greatly. Cooking Faster:1550 Watts power air fryer make your food faster to cook and help you save time. 4 knobs control design:Easy to operation and durable, 60-minute timer/auto shutoff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good value for money, great toaster and countertop oven. I especially like the Convection Over feature - I use that the most and it really adds flavor to fish and chicken and burgers. It's compact and VERY easy to use - knobs, not digital nonsense.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the grown child that doesn’t think ahead
reviews.reviewText: Ok, so my grown daughter wanted to do Christmas at her house this year. She invited a bunch of people, and was planning a big dinner. Then she calls me three days before, and says “oh yeah, my oven doesn’t work”… like, how in the hell was she going to cook a massive dinner in the first place. So I ordered her this. It arrived in time, and she pulled it off. The oven is large enough for a ham, and can even fit a large casserole dish. Heated evenly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A replacement for my elderly mother with dementia, it HAD to be "EASY" to use!
reviews.reviewText: Nice looking unit, larger than my mother's old one. The AIR FRYER option was EXCELLENT! Just for my mother to make meals only for herself, she got excited to be able to use the Air Fryer option for french fries! It is easy to clean for the most part should any food scraps fall during cooking...The cooking options are easy to understand as well as the temperature gauge, and timer is always a necessity. The surprising "BONUS" was this toaster oven also has a LIGHT! This is really a great product, well made and multi-purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great slow cooker
reviews.reviewText: I bought this and sent it to my youngest son because he has no way to "cook" anything in the home he is currently living which is being worked on/flipped by the owner. He was very thankful for it! He can quit eating PBJ, cereal, junk, and cook some real food.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We loved this product for 4 months and then it broke. Zero power. Tested the outlet, nope it’s broken. And, the return window is closed. I purchased this in October and it broke in January. I emailed the company, no response. DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the size and options for different uses in one product but I noticed that the oven over burns extra bakes/ blackens my food up quickly and I even lowered the temperature and it didn’t help. The air fryer works good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great size, funtions and customer service
reviews.reviewText: We purchased one years ago, for our vacation home, as our toaster over ‘died.’ When I researched and found I could airfry, All In One unit; it had been perfect and still going strong. We downsized and moved into a new home, so purchased our second Aumate, of course! After only 5 months, all functions died except toaster. We contacted Aumate directly, with our dilemma. They shipped a new one, after providing our Amazon bill of sale; no questions asked and did not want the broken one. We are extremely happy with customer service of Aumate!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Airfryer,,,, 100% Love This
reviews.reviewText: Very Roomy, We have made many diff meals , breakfast, Lunches, ect and I was very Impressed to actually find it is the same quality, Look and size as my moms Samsung but almost 1/2 the price. The entire oven is the exact same Look of the Samsung, I now am wondering if this company is owned by Samsung? It works Great, I learned to cook with my moms All the countless Items . I do believe bc it’s j just the same Oven, Except A Lot were sold to Samsung & then a Huge lot to this Brand. I Am Very Satisfied since I have no learning to do since it’s exactly as my mom’s Samsung Oven. Just that mine is a Name that’s not very well known. But compare next to Eachother and u would never notice. It’s an exact replica 👍🏻 for almost $50 cheaper . I’ll give it a 5.However we still Love to use our Air fryer in our New LG over when we’re cooking for Family holiday meals
